name: Confiz
description:
Confiz is a full-service technology company with a proven track record of producing high-performance mobility solutions and portal applications. Throughout its history, Confiz has expanded its offerings and capitalized on evolving technology trends to better serve its clients.
While a lot of what we do at Confiz is around people and vertical enablement, the real value is in the method we use to get there.

locations.address: Confiz Limited Leeds Centre, Gulberg III
